text: Ara amara to bahu jina o manabake jahannamera jan'ya srsti karechi [2]; tadera hrdaya ache kintu ta dbara tara upalabdhi kare na, tadera cokha ache ta dbara tara dekhe na ebam tadera kana ache ta dbara tara sune na; tara catuspada jantura mata, baram tara ceye'o besi bibhranta. Tara'i hacche gaphela
